message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $13,000.  It's a great deal, and I believe it's worth every penny.  Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your product, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $11,500 for your product.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still hoping to get closer to my asking price.  How about we meet in the middle at $12,250?  I'm confident this product will be worth it to you!
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am still looking to keep the price within my budget. I would like to propose $12,000 as the final price for your product.
